While around the vicinity of my hotel, I noticed many outdoor seating restaurants, do I gave this restaurant a try.  I mainly wanted to try local tapas dishes.  The staff was eager to get me seated and take my initial order, but everything fell through after that.  I ended up waiting quite a bit for subsequent orders of tapas and had to ask for the bill three times before getting it (with an attitude from the waiter).  With many choices to dine in the area outdoors, I would not recommend eating at this restaurant.
